mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member.MEMBERPAYMENTSTATUS='입금회원' WHERE member.MEMBERID=#{id};
mapper.select: SELECT member.MEMBERID AS id, member.MEMBERNAME AS name, member.MEMBERPHONE AS phone, member.MEMBERADDR AS addr FROM member WHERE member.MEMBERPAYMENTSTATUS='미입금';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( memberid, memberpw, membername, memberbirthday, memberphone, memberaddr, joinday, libcode, MEMBERPAYMENTSTATUS ) VALUES( #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{addr}, now(), #{libCode}, '미입금' )
